alert.note: Alert for Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 18 at 7:15AM EST until January 18 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30. * WHERE...In Florida, Hamilton, Baker, Inland Nassau and Northern Columbia Counties. In Georgia, Inland Glynn, Inland Camden, Northeastern Charlton, Southern Ware and Western Charlton Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.

area.areaDesc: Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
